origination.corpname: United States. National War Labor Board (1942-1945)

did.abstract: This collection consists of statements, exhibits and documents presented to a panel hearing of the NWLB in 1943 on a petition from the United Steelworkers of America for a wage adjustment which exceeded the 15 percent increase adopted in the so-called "Little Steel Formula."
